synthesis_conditions.chemicals_used: dimethyl 5-bromo-benzene-1,3-dicarboxylate (5.4 g, 19.8 mmol), bis(pinacolato)diborane (6.0 g, 23.6 mmol), potassium acetate (5.6 g, 57.2 mmol), Pd(dppf)2Cl2 (0.2 g, 0.28 mmol), dried 1,4-dioxane (50 mL)
synthesis_conditions.drying_method: dried with anhydrous MgSO4 and solvent removed in a vacuum

synthesis_conditions.chemicals_used: 2, 7-dibromo-9H-fluorene (3.28 g, 10.0 mmol), dimethyl (5-pinacolboryl)isopthalate (9.26 g, 30.0 mmol), K2CO3 (13.82 g, 100.0 mmol), 1,4- dioxane (250 mL), Pd(PPh3)4 (0.47 g,0.43 mmol)
synthesis_conditions.washing_method: taken up in CHCl3 dried over MgSO4

synthesis_conditions.chemicals_used: Tetramethy 5,5’-(9H-fluorene-2,7-diyl)diisophthalate (H4FDDI-Me) (3.31g, 6.00mmol), 1,4-dioxane (20 mL), 10 M NaOH aqueous solution (50 mL)
synthesis_conditions.washing_method: Dilute HCl added until pH = 2, solid collected by filtration

synthesis_conditions.yield: Elemental analysis provided instead of yield percentage
